item.title: CVE-2024-35781|2024-07-08T08:56:40.455Z -- yahman -- word%20balloon
item.description: Improper Limitation of a Pathname to a Restricted Directory ('Path Traversal') vulnerability in YAHMAN Word Balloon allows PHP Local File Inclusion.This issue affects Word Balloon: from n/a through 4.21.1.
